mapper.sql: id, servicenum, memberid, begintime, endtime, type, ctime, isdel
mapper.insert: insert into memberauth (id, servicenum, memberid, begintime, endtime, type, ctime, isdel) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{servicenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into memberauth
id,
servicenum,
memberid,
begintime,
endtime,
type,
ctime,
isdel,

mapper.update:
update memberauth
servicenum = #{servicenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update memberauth set servicenum = #{servicenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ma.servicenum from memberauth ma where ma.isdel = 0 and ma.type = 0 and DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(ma.endtime,'%Y-%m-%d') and ma.memberid = '${memberid}'
